Posts.Content: Aug 4, 2011 07:29PM suey wrote: Hi - I just joined. I was diagnosed with metastatic breast cancer in my spine. I just turned 40, have never married and have no children. I just had a double mastectomy with flap reconstruction (no implants) and ovary removal. Is there anyone out there with the same type surgery and diagnosis I could talk to?
